name: Oaric
appearance: Tall, rope-muscled, with silvered hair braided in tide-knots; coat stitched with brass fish-scale plates; hands stained with brine glyph ink.
character: Grave engineer-priest who treats water like a liturgy; protective of crews and codes; speaks in measured, tidal metaphors.
talents: hears the ‘mood’ of water through stone
works without sleep in tight cycles
dreams: Extend causeways and secure new siphon rights at Saltfang Geysers
Engineer a safe way to ‘walk’ the city a pace someday
secrets: Knows the harmonics to prime a hidden bypass beneath Spine Market
Once throttled flow to a warehouse row to win a vote, then restored it before dawn
Keeps a private copy of old designs the Tongues asked to burn
